Sky Knight had made up his mind. He was going to take Berserk out 
into public. He needed to see how he would react. And plus, he needed 
to get the clone some weapons. He tried to retreive them but the 
court-bots had labeled them evidence. So, the scientist team would 
have to get a whole new set of weapons for the big, burly bot at 
their expense. 

He opened his comm to Techy from his desk: "Techy, tell the others 
we're taking Berserk today. We'll take the hover down to vector C. 
There's a weapons shop down there."

"All right." she replied.
